price: Akkasuma, ergamaan tokkos warra isaan dura turanitti hin dhufne, yoo isaan “falfalaadha; yookiin maraataadha” jedhaniin malee.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika mā atā alladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūnun
